description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Challenge yourself with a game of Cross Sums, a logic-based number placement game. Thousands of unique puzzles are at your fingertips.  If you like crossword puzzles or sudoku, you'll love Cross Sums!
